snippet: Justyna Kowalczyk of Poland won her third stage in the Tour de Ski in Dobbiaco, Italy, and extended her overall lead as she closed in on a fourth consecutive title.
lead_paragraph: Justyna Kowalczyk of Poland won her third stage in the Tour de Ski in Dobbiaco, Italy, and extended her overall lead as she closed in on a fourth consecutive title.

headline.main: Pole Extends Lead at Tour de Ski
